title: Pushpa 2 stampede: Hyderabad theatre gets show cause notice after woman's death - India Today
summary:
Hyderabad Theatre Issues Notice After Pushpa 2 Stampede Death

Published On: Dec 18, 2024

Source: India Today

Following a tragic stampede during the screening of Pushpa 2, Hyderabad police have issued a notice to Sandhya Theatre management over multiple management lapses that led to a woman's death.

  • The theatre management has been issued a show cause notice citing 11 lapses during the screening.
  • The management allegedly failed to inform local authorities about actor Allu Arjun's arrival prior to the incident.
  • Improper entry, exit, and seating arrangements were cited as significant failures.
  • Management encouraged crowding with unauthorized large advertisements outside the theatre.
  • Sufficient security measures were not in place, contributing to the chaos.
A 39-year-old woman named Revathi died during the stampede, while her son was critically injured.

The police warned that the theatre must respond within 10 days or they risk having their Cinematograph License revoked.
newTitle: Hyderabad Theatre Issues Notice After Pushpa 2 Stampede Death

title: ‘Indian films laapataa’: Hansal Mehta slams FFI's ‘strike rate’ after Kiran Rao's Laapataa Ladies exits Oscars 2025 race - Hindustan Times
summary:
Hansal Mehta Criticizes Film Federation of India After Laapataa Ladies Exits Oscars 2025 Race

Date: Dec 18, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Hindi film Laapataa Ladies, directed by Kiran Rao, has been eliminated from contention for the Best International Feature category at the Oscars 2025, prompting backlash from filmmakers and the public regarding the Film Federation of India’s selection process.

  • Laapataa Ladies was India's official entry for the Oscars 2025 but failed to make it to the shortlist.
  • Hansal Mehta sarcastically criticized FFI’s poor track record in selecting Oscar contenders on social media.
  • Composer Ricky Kej joined the criticism, expressing that many deserving films are overlooked.
  • The shortlist includes notable international films, with India missing out again.
“When are we going to realize.. year after year.. we are choosing the wrong films.” – Ricky Kej

The ongoing discussion suggests a need for reevaluation of the films chosen by the FFI for international representation, reflecting dissatisfaction within the film community.

title: Shatrughan Sinha blasts Mukesh Khanna for jibe at Sonakshi Sinha's upbringing: 'Who appointed him guardian of Hinduism' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Shatrughan Sinha blasts Mukesh Khanna for jibe at Sonakshi Sinha's upbringing

Date: Dec 18, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Shatrughan Sinha has come to the defense of his daughter, Sonakshi Sinha, after actor Mukesh Khanna criticized her upbringing following her inability to answer a question about the Ramayana on a quiz show.

  • Mukesh Khanna criticized Sonakshi Sinha for not knowing a Ramayana answer on KBC.
  • Shatrughan Sinha questions Khanna's authority to comment on Hinduism.
  • Sonakshi's response highlighted the gender bias in Khanna's remarks.
  • Shatrughan expressed pride in Sonakshi's achievements and defended her character.
“Not answering a question on the Ramayana doesn’t disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu. She doesn’t need a certificate of approval from anyone.” - Shatrughan Sinha

This public dispute highlights the ongoing conversation around celebrity culture, online scrutiny, and personal autonomy in the public eye.
newTitle: Shatrughan Sinha defends daughter Sonakshi against Mukesh Khanna's remarks

title: Pushpa 2 Stampede Victim Suffers Brain Damage, Hyderabad Police Visit Him After Allu Arjun Arrest - News18
summary:
Pushpa 2 Stampede Victim Suffers Brain Damage, Hyderabad Police Visit Him After Allu Arjun Arrest

Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: CNN-News18

An eight-year-old boy, Sri Tej, suffered severe injuries and brain damage during a stampede at the Pushpa 2 premiere at Sandhya Theatre. He is currently hospitalized and on ventilator support after sustaining injuries that resulted in a lack of oxygen supply.

  • The boy has been fighting for his life in the hospital.
  • Hyderabad Police Commissioner C. V. Anand shared that the recovery will be a long process.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested due to the incident and has not yet visited the victim.
  • Legal proceedings are ongoing, with police likely to challenge Arjun's interim bail.
“The survivor has suffered brain damage due to lack of oxygen supply during the stampede and the doctors have said that it will be a long haul for the brain to develop the capacity to analyse signals.” - C. V. Anand

The incident highlights the tragic consequences of crowd management failures at public events and the urgent need for improved safety measures.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Stampede Victim Suffers Brain Damage, Hyderabad Police Visit Him After Allu Arjun Arrest

title: Pushpa 2 The Rule stampede: Show cause notice issued to theatre management after woman's death at Sandhya theatre - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Stampede: Show Cause Notice Issued to Sandhya Theatre for '11 Lapses' After Woman's Death at Premiere

Publication Date: December 12, 2023 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Hyderabad police has issued a show cause notice to Sandhya Theatre for lapses leading to a woman's death during the premiere of Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2'.

  • The notice outlines 11 alleged lapses by the theatre management.
  • Management failed to inform police about Allu Arjun's arrival, leading to crowd mismanagement.
  • No proper guidance for entry and exit points, encouraging crowd gathering without permission.
  • Inadequate security arrangements resulted in the tragic incident.
  • A case registered against Allu Arjun and theatre management following a complaint from the deceased woman's family.
  • A medical update indicated the boy injured in the incident is in stable condition but still requires intensive care.
“The neurological condition is severely impacted. The doctors have opined that it will be a long haul before any improvements can be seen.”

The incident has raised significant concerns about safety protocols at major events, highlighting the need for strict adherence to crowd management practices.
newTitle: Hyderabad Theatre Issued Notice After Deadly Pushpa 2 Premiere Stampede

summary:
Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh’s remuneration for Baby John revealed

Published on Dec 18, 2024 by 123telugu

Bollywood star Varun Dhawan and National Award-winning South actress Keerthy Suresh will soon be seen in the highly anticipated action drama, Baby John, an official remake of Theri.

  • Varun Dhawan received Rs 25 crore for his role.
  • Keerthy Suresh was paid Rs 4 crore.
  • Other cast remuneration included Jackie Shroff (Rs 1.50 crore), Rajpal Yadav (Rs 1 crore), Sanya Malhotra (Rs 1 crore), and Wamiqa Gabbi (Rs 40 lakhs).
  • Salman Khan has a special cameo, but his payment is undisclosed.
  • The film is produced by Atlee, Murad Khetani, and Jyoti Deshpande, with music by Tollywood composer Thaman.
  • Release date is set for December 25, 2024.
“Given their massive popularity across the country, both Varun and Keerthy have reportedly been paid whopping remuneration.”

In conclusion, the financial figures associated with the star cast of Baby John reflect their significant market value and the film's high expectations.

Shatrughan Sinha has come to the defense of his daughter, Sonakshi, after Mukesh Khanna criticized her for not knowing an answer related to the Ramayana during a game show.

“Not answering a question on the Ramayan doesn’t disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu. She doesn’t need a certificate of approval from anyone.” - Shatrughan Sinha
